section2CmdHdr.Title: Edit Clipping
section2CmdHdr.ShortHelp: Lets you edit the clipping definition.
section2CmdHdr.LongHelp:
In the context toolbar, choose options to customize the section (rezise, position, orientation, viewPoint etc.).

  • To rotate the plane, move the arc handle of the Robot.
  • To position the plane on a specific surface of the object, drag the blue central sphere towards that surface.
  • To translate the plane, Drag the Robot handles and enter the required value on the rule, or use the slider if available.
LockUnlockSectionHdr.Title: Activate Clipping
LockUnlockSectionHdr.ShortHelp: To activate or deactivate the clipping of the objects in 3D Area.
LockUnlockSectionHdr.LongHelp: Toggles the visibility of the objects outside of the defined Region of Interest (ROI). The ROI is defined with the help of planes called clipping planes
sectionCmdHdr.Title: Edit Clipping
sectionCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Lets you edit the clipping definition.
sectionCmdHdr.LongHelp: In the context toolbar, choose options to customize the section (clipping definition, rezise, position, orientation, viewPoint etc.).
DeactivateClipping.Title: Activate Clipping
DeactivateClipping.ShortHelp: To deactivate the clipping of the objects in 3D Area
DeactivateClipping.LongHelp: Toggles the visibility of the objects outside of the defined Region of Interest (ROI). The ROI is defined with the help of planes called clipping planes
ActivateClipping.Title: Activate Clipping
ActivateClipping.ShortHelp: To activate the clipping of the objects in 3D Area
ActivateClipping.LongHelp: Toggles the visibility of the objects outside of the defined Region of Interest (ROI). The ROI is defined with the help of planes called clipping planes
